name: Santastrophe
description:
Santa's sack has torn and presents have been flung everywhere, what a mess! As Santa, collect as many presents as you can while grabbing snacks to stop yourself tiring out.

Controls

  • Jump - Up Arrow/SPACE
  • Slide - Down Arrow

This game was made for the AIE 2021 Festive Game Jam.

Artists

  • Lily Stuart - https://artstation.com/chowdonut
  • Liv Harris

Designer

  • Chris Selleck -  LinkedIn

Programmer

  • Paul King

Music

Christmas Spirit by Shane Ivers - https://www.silvermansound.com
